 <?php
    highlight_file(__FILE__);
    class emmm
    {
        public static function checkFile(&$page)
        {
            $whitelist = ["source"=>"source.php","hint"=>"hint.php"];  //ç™½åå•
            if (! isset($page) || !is_string($page)) {  //ç©ºå‚çš„è¯å°±è¿”å›false
                echo "you can't see it";
                return false;
            }

            if (in_array($page, $whitelist)) {   //åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦åœ¨ç™½åå•
                return true;
            }

            $_page = mb_substr(   //æˆªå–ç½‘å€0åˆ°?çš„éƒ¨åˆ†
                $page,
                0,
                mb_strpos($page . '?', '?')
            );
            if (in_array($_page, $whitelist)) {
                return true;
            }

            $_page = urldecode($page);  //è§£ç ä¸€æ¬¡
            $_page = mb_substr(
                $_page,
                0,
                mb_strpos($_page . '?', '?')
            );
            if (in_array($_page, $whitelist)) {
                return true;
            }
            echo "you can't see it";
            return false;
        }
    }

    if (! empty($_REQUEST['file'])
        && is_string($_REQUEST['file'])
        && emmm::checkFile($_REQUEST['file'])
    ) {
        include $_REQUEST['file'];
        exit;
    } else {
        echo "<br><img src=\"https://i.loli.net/2018/11/01/5bdb0d93dc794.jpg\" />";
    }

class Number {
public:
    int value;
    Number(int v = 0) : value(v) {}

    // å‰ç½®++
    Number& operator++() {
        ++value;
        return *this;
    }

    // åç½®++
    Number operator++(int) {
        Number temp = *this;
        ++value;
        return temp;
    }
};

class Point {
public:
    friend ostream& operator<<(ostream& os, const Point& p) {
        os << "(" << p.x << ", " << p.y << ")";
        return os;
    }
    friend istream& operator>>(istream& is, Point& p) {
        is >> p.x >> p.y;
        return is;
    }
private:
    int x, y;
};
